explanations.C: Correct! 不要 (bù yào) means 'don't want' or 'don't'

explanations.A: To like is 喜欢 (xǐ huān)
explanations.B: Correct! 不喜欢 (bù xǐ huān) means 'don't like'
explanations.C: To hate is 讨厌 (tǎo yàn)
explanations.D: Don't want is 不要 (bù yào)

explanations.A: To need is 需要 (xū yào)
explanations.C: Correct! 帮助 (bāng zhù) means 'to help'

explanations.A: To know is 知道 (zhī dào)
explanations.D: To remember is 记得 (jì de)

explanations.B: To know is 知道 (zhī dào)
explanations.C: Correct! 不懂 (bù dǒng) means 'don't understand'
explanations.D: Don't know is 不知道 (bù zhī dào)

explanations.C: Correct! 知道 (zhī dào) means 'to know'
explanations.D: To remember is 记得 (jì de)

explanations.A: No time is 没时间 (méi shí jiān)
explanations.B: Correct! 有时间 (yǒu shí jiān) means 'have time'
explanations.C: Need time is 需要时间 (xū yào shí jiān)
explanations.D: What time is 几点 (jǐ diǎn)

explanations.A: Have time is 有时间 (yǒu shí jiān)
explanations.B: What time is 几点 (jǐ diǎn)
explanations.C: Correct! 没时间 (méi shí jiān) means 'no time'
explanations.D: Need time is 需要时间 (xū yào shí jiān)

explanations.A: Bad is 坏 (huài) or 不好 (bù hǎo)
explanations.D: Not good is 不好 (bù hǎo)

explanations.A: To need is 需要 (xū yào)
explanations.C: Correct! 想要 (xiǎng yào) means 'to want' (desire)
explanations.D: Don't want is 不要 (bù yào)

explanations.C: Tablet is 平板电脑 (píng bǎn diàn nǎo)

explanations.A: Bicycle is 自行车 (zì xíng chē)
explanations.D: Bus is 公交车 (gōng jiāo chē)

explanations.A: Taxi is 出租车 (chū zū chē)
explanations.C: Correct! 公交车 (gōng jiāo chē) means 'bus'

explanations.D: Tablet is 平板电脑 (píng bǎn diàn nǎo)

explanations.A: Notebook is 笔记本 (bǐ jì běn)

explanations.B: Desk is also 桌子 or 书桌 (shū zhuō)

explanations.D: Gate is also 门 (mén) or 大门 (dà mén)

explanations.B: Radio is 收音机 (shōu yīn jī)
explanations.D: Phone is 手机 (shǒu jī) or 电话 (diàn huà)
Box is 盒子 (hé zi) or 箱子 (xiāng zi)
